mapper.select: select * from emember where emem_id=#{emem_id} and emem_pw=#{emem_pw}
mapper.update: update emember set emem_pw=#{emem_pw},emem_name=#{emem_name},emem_pnum=#{emem_pnum}, emem_birthd=#{emem_birthd} where emem_id=#{emem_id}
mapper.insert: insert into inquiry values((select nvl(max(inq_id), 0)+1 from inquiry), #{emem_id}, #{inq_title}, #{inq_content} ,SYSDATE,'대기중',0)
